author: Enoba
title: 5 best Milk Makeup lip products to try in 2025
text:
Milk Makeup has been around for a while, and beauty enthusiasts love the brand for its vegan and easy-to-use products. Their lip products are TikTok famous and extolled for their colorful and hydrating qualities.
The Cooling Water Jelly Tint is a ninth-time award winner and has received praise for its innovative beauty formula. Studies, as indicated on the brand’s website, have shown that other milk Makeup products, like the Odyssey Lip Oil Gloss and the KUSH Hydrating Lip Oil, provide smooth and plump lips.
The brand’s lip products are made from ingredients rich in vitamins and promise healthy and moisturized lips. The list below explores some of the best lip products from the New York City-based cosmetic company.
Disclaimer: This article reflects the writer's opinion only and is ranked in no particular order.
Electric Glossy Lip Plumper, The Odyssey lip oil gloss, and 3 other lip products from Milk Makeup to explore in 2025
1) Electric Glossy Lip Plumper
The Electric Glossy Lip Plumper has received glowing reviews from beauty influencers and experts. The bestselling product promises fuller, smoother, and plumper lips after first and continuous use.
The lip product comes with a five-star rating on the brand’s website and features vegan ingredients. The glossy lip plumper has Sichuan pepper as an ingredient, which gives the appearance of smoother lips.
The Vegan collagen serves as a moisturizer for the lips. Volulip, another constituent, increases lip volume, while Jojoba oil is an antioxidant. Shop this bestseller for $25 on the brand’s website.
2) The Odyssey Lip Oil gloss
The Odyssey Lip Oil Gloss is a bestseller, and for good reason. Consumers praise the gloss for its long-lasting, hydrating, and non-sticky features. This lip oil gloss boasts a five-star review and features natural, cruelty-free, and, clean products.
The Jojoba oil constituent is rich in antioxidants and acts, alongside the Goji berry extract, which promotes skin elasticity. The cloudberry seed oil boasts high levels of vitamins C and E for nourishing and moisturizing the lips. The Odyssey Lip Oil Gloss comes with a price tag of $26 on the brand’s website.
3) KUSH Sheer Hydrating Lip Oil
This lip product from Milk Makeup boasts a five-star review and effective clinical results from a consumer perception study of over 31 users. The brand describes the KUSH Sheer Hydrating lip oil as a product that promises hydration and fuller-looking lips.
The 92% naturally made lip product features Hemp seed oil, which conditions and hydrates the lips. The Sunflower and coconut oil combo works to soothe and moisten. The Camellia Japonica seed oil constituent helps restore chapped lips. Shop the KUSH Sheer Hydrating lip oil for $26 on the brand’s website.
4) Lip + Cheek cream blush + lip color
The versatile lip + cheek from Milk Makeup is a color palette for the lips and a non-comedogenic blush stick for the cheeks. According to the brand description, the product blends easily with makeup and offers a pop of color.
The Lip + Cheek lip color and blush come in both shades of cream and shimmer. For use as lipstick, twist off the protective disk from the stick and apply directly on the lips. The Lip + Cheek stems from mango butter, Avocado, and Apricot oil. Shop the 2-in-1 product for $24 on the brand’s website.
5) Cooling Water Jelly Tint
The Cooling Water Jelly Tint was named the Makeup Product of the Year by WWD and Beauty Inc. The jelly-like lip product acts as a jelly blush and lip stain and comes in six shades.
The brand describes this product as a hydrating mix that provides a sheer and long-lasting color on the lips and face. It is made from Vegan collagen, Aloe Vera, and seawater. Shop this bestselling lip product for $24 on the brand’s website.
These products reflect the brand's popular and easy-to-use cosmetic leanings and sell between $24 and $26.

author: El Mercurio S.A.P.
title: De 0 a 100 km/h en 2,78 segundos: Xiaomi presenta oficialmente su primer auto eléctrico
text:
Después de años de espera desde que anunció su ingreso a la industria automotriz, finalmente Xiaomi presentó su primer vehículo que llegará a los mercados internacionales durante los próximos meses . Se trata del Xiaomi SU7, el primer coche eléctrico de la firma pekinesa que fue exhibido a nivel mundial por el propio fundador de la marca, Lei Jun.
En términos estéticos, el vehículo muestra rasgos similares a los modelos de Tesla con líneas bien definidas y rasgos deportivos. Mismas características que también lo hacen parecerse al popular Porsche Taycan. Estará disponible en azul, gris y verde.
Con dimensiones de 4,99 metros de largo, 1,96 metros de ancho y 1,4 metros de alto , además de una distancia entre ejes de 3000 milímetros, el vehículo se enmarca dentro del segmento sedán. El modelo de entrada pesa 1980 kilos, mientras que la versión premium alcanza los 2205 kilos (existen solo dos versiones).
El interior destaca por el lujo y tecnología. Es así que luce un Heads-Up Display avanzado, además de diferentes pantallas de grandes dimensiones y el sistema operativo HyperOS.
También fue equipado con tecnología autónom a basada en LIDAR que le permite estacionar sin pasajeros a bordo, hasta sortrear algunos obstáculos durante la circulación por calles abiertas.
En el apartado mecánico, el Xiaomi SU7 de entrada equipará un motor HyperEngine V6, contará con tracción trasera (RWD) y alcanzará los 210 km/h de velocidad punta (limitada electrónicamente).
Por otro lado, la versión premium tendrá un motor HyperEngine V6s que le permitirá llegar a los 265 km/h. En este caso la tracción es a las cuatro ruedas (AWD) y podrá pasar de 0 a 100 km/h en 2,78 segundos .
La batería es otro de los datos que sorprende ya que según medios internacionales tendrá una potencia máxima de 150 kWh y una impresionante autonomía de más de 1.200 km.
“Este es un importante paso adelante a medida que continuamos invirtiendo en tecnología E-Motor y nos esforzamos por convertirnos en un actor líder en la industria ”, dijo Lei Jun, CEO y fundador de Xiaomi.

author: VNExplorer
title: 5 Steps to protect your hair from summer heat
text: Shutterstock ALBAWABA As the summer months roll in, the combination of heat, humidity, and exposure to the sun can wreak havoc on your hair. To keep your locks healthy and looking their best, it's essential to take proactive steps to protect them from the harsh summer conditions. Here are five key steps to help you shield your hair from the damaging effects of the summer heat. 1. Hydrate Your Hair Regularly One of the most crucial steps in summer hair care is keeping your hair hydrated. The sun can strip your hair of its natural moisture, leaving it dry and brittle. To counteract this, use a hydrating shampoo and conditioner designed to replenish moisture. Consider incorporating a leave-in conditioner or a deep conditioning treatment into your routine once a week to give your hair an extra boost of hydration. Pro Tip: Use products containing natural oils like argan, coconut, or jojoba oil for additional moisture and nourishment. 2. Minimize Heat Styling Summer heat combined with heat styling tools can lead to excessive damage and breakage. To protect your hair, limit the use of blow dryers, curling irons, and straighteners. Embrace your natural hair texture or opt for heat-free styling methods, such as braids, buns, or air-drying your hair. Pro Tip: If you must use heat styling tools, apply a heat protectant spray to shield your hair from the high temperatures. 3. Shield Your Hair from the Sun Prolonged sun exposure can lead to hair damage, including dryness, color fading, and split ends. To protect your hair from harmful UV rays, wear a hat or a scarf when you’re outside for extended periods. Additionally, you can use hair products that contain UV filters to provide an extra layer of protection against sun damage. Pro Tip: Apply a leave-in conditioner with UV protection before heading to the beach or spending the day outdoors. 4. Rinse After Swimming Chlorine from pools and saltwater from the ocean can strip your hair of its natural oils, leaving it dry and prone to damage. Always rinse your hair with fresh water immediately after swimming to remove any residual chlorine or salt. Follow up with a gentle shampoo and conditioner to restore moisture and protect your hair from potential damage. Pro Tip: Apply a leave-in conditioner before swimming to create a barrier against chlorine and saltwater. 5. Trim Regularly to Prevent Split Ends Regular trims are essential for maintaining healthy hair, especially during the summer when hair is more susceptible to damage. Schedule trims every 6-8 weeks to remove split ends and prevent them from traveling up the hair shaft, which can lead to more significant breakage. Provided by SyndiGate Media Inc. (Syndigate.info).

author: Lewis Noke-Edwards
title: Review: Shure MoveMic Two Receiver Kit
text: Good quality content in 2024 is pretty much reliant on two main things, great ideas and quality gear to capture it. Whilst there are some specialised pieces of equipment geared towards content creators from some relatively new names in audio, having an industry stalwart such as Shure in the content creator game is kind of a big deal and with it a sense of legitimacy, especially when it comes to the requirements of audio equipment in this particular corner of the market. Having released some pretty exciting gear over the past few years such as the MV7+podcasting mic and the MV6 USB gaming mic, Shure have been making serious strides in the content creator world with these products being quickly adopted by many, but the pro audio veterans aren’t stopping there. Catch up on all the latest music gear reviews [here.](https://mixdownmag.com.au/reviews/) Having been established in broadcast for decades, namely with the iconic SM7B being a mainstay in this sphere, it’s no surprise with the epic rise of podcasting and other varieties of online content that these mics alone can be spotted in the studio spaces of some of the biggest names in podcasting. Whilst this has secured the brand’s name in this space, for the countless creatives who don’t have the luxury of a dedicated studio space, let alone the budget for one let alone a handful of these microphones, the SM7B may not be the most suitable option. With so much content being created in various locations and audiences still expecting “studio quality” production value, more compact, elegant and quality audio solutions have become a priority for those creating on the move. Shure have certainly recognised this and their new line of MoveMic solutions speaks to this directly. Far from being a compact lavalier mic, the new MoveMic is a compact clip-on mic system which boasts high fidelity audio transmitted wirelessly, direct to a connected device. Coming in three options being the MoveMic One, MoveMic Two and MoveMic Two Receiver Kit, each option caters to a variety of users from the solo creator/instructor, through to interviewers/journalists or the full kit for videographers and higher production needs. Designed by the same team of engineers behind Shure’s legendary wireless microphone systems which are used day-in day-out by some of the world’s bigger touring artists, festivals, production houses and venues, these petite little microphones mean business. Providing the ability to capture 2-channels of audio at 48kHz via Bluetooth is pretty wild and being spec’d with a 30m range is particularly impressive for field recordings and on location shoots where the capture device, be it a connected phone, computer or the MoveMic receiver (which is cold shoe mountable for easy attachment to cameras) is set up a distance away from the mics. What’s more, MoveMic transmits via Bluetooth, making setup for an interview or video shoot incredibly fast, alleviating the need to work with and attach cumbersome transmitters, a massive plus. Capturing audio from the MoveMic is equally as convenient as it seems the Shure team have gone to lengths to make this system as streamlined and user friendly as possible being able to near instantly start recording directing to your phone via one of the ShurePlus MOTIV apps. But for those with existing gear, setups and associated apps, simply connecting the MoveMic receiver via the included 3.5mm cable to a camera or via USB-C to a phone or computer is equally as easy and simple to set up. MoveMic Two Receiver Kit In practice, the MoveMic Two Receiver Kit really is dead simple to use. Wanting to see the differences between the ShurePlus MOTIV apps, I downloaded both the audio and video apps. Both were a breeze to set up and use immediately, pairing with the mics straight away I was recording in no time. The presets available for speech and singers I found were a solid starting point, with the ability to quickly tweak settings further with convenient control over gain, high pass filter, EQ and compression. Having the mics connected to my phone to BlueTooth via the app there was some latency, as to be expected when monitoring with headphones, but this wasn’t a big deal and in reality when using these mics for the intended scenarios you’d typically just be checking monitoring for levels and tweaking a couple of settings before hitting record anyway. Both apps are well laid out, intuitive and incredibly easy to use, with clear indications for input level, metering, input monitoring and muting of the mics. The ability to custom name the connected mics both within the app and on the MoveMic receiver as well as the captured media is super useful too, helping keep track of things in editing and post. The noise reduction feature works really well, and as for the audio quality, it’s pretty damn impressive. Voice was incredibly clear and I didn’t find it was overly hyped or brittle sounding, but rather nicely isolated, crisp, detailed and polished, with little or no need for further processing. This neat mic kit is a game changer for content creators and for those needing an affordable high quality solution for their audio needs particularly for those creating content on the move need not look further. The convenient carry pouch makes the MoveMic Receiver Kit ideal for throwing in the backpack or production kit with all the included accessories being practical, well thought out and never feeling overdone. With a total of 24 hours record time available (8 hours per mic with 2 charges from the charging case) there’s very little the MoveMic Receiver Kit doesn’t cover, if only it could take care of editing your content too. For local Shure enquiries, keep reading at [Jands](https://www.jands.com.au/brands/shure.html?page=1).

author: @Viktoriya311303
title: Peligro Potencial en la Base Aérea de la OTAN: Revelando los Hechos Conocidos y los Desconocidos
text: - Posibilidad de intrusión en el territorio aéreo de la OTAN Según Informes, la instalación de la OTAN en Geilenkirchen, la base aérea de Renania del Norte-Westfalia, ha pasado al segundo nivel más alto de alerta de seguridad. A continuación, lo que sabemos hasta ahora: LA SITUACIÓN La Escena: La Fuerza de Advertencia Temprana y Control de la OTAN estacionada en Geilenkirchen cerca de Aquisgrán ha elevado su nivel de alerta a Charlie. Como precaución, se ha aconsejado a los personal no esencial que se queden en casa, según el portavoz de la base. Esta decisión se basa en advertencias de inteligencia que sugieren un posible riesgo. Nivel de Alerta Charlie: En este nivel de seguridad, se ha producido un evento o hay una alta probabilidad de atentados terroristas contra la alianza. "Esto no es motivo de preocupación y es simplemente una medida precautoria para poder continuar con nuestras actividades vitales", aclaró el portavoz. El nivel más alto, Delta, se activa una vez que se ha producido o es inminente un atentado terrorista. La Base: La OTAN opera su plataforma de advertencia aérea AWACS en Geilenkirchen. Esta base alberga catorce aviones Boeing 707 reconfigurados que escanean el espacio aéreo en busca de posibles amenazas y alertan a la alianza. La unidad multinacional realiza tanto vigilancia aérea como marítima y actúa como centro de mando volador en operaciones. La unidad ha participado en diversas operaciones, incluyendo las del Balkanes y Afganistán. Después de la invasión rusa de Ucrania, la OTAN desplegó temporalmente aviones en Rumanía. Investigación: La policía de Colonia asumió el control de la investigación por la noche. No se han revelado más detalles sobre el número de fuerzas desplegadas. Un reportero de dpa observó vehículos policiales en el lugar. Alertas Previas: En julio, se habló de una mayor vigilancia en las bases militares de EE. UU. en Alemania y otros países europeos debido a advertencias terroristas. CNN informó de que el nivel de seguridad más alto, Charlie, se había elevado en estas bases durante el fin de semana. La naturaleza de la amenaza alegada no se reveló. LO QUE NO ESTÁ CLARO El Origen de la Alerta: Las razones detrás del aumento del nivel de alerta en Geilenkirchen siguen inciertas. Ni la policía, el Ministerio de Defensa ni la OTAN han compartido ninguna información al respecto. Posibles Conexiones: Esta semana se informaron varios drones volando sobre una zona industrial en Brunsbüttel. El origen y los objetivos de los drones siguen desconocidos. No está claro si esto está relacionado con el aumento del nivel de alerta en Geilenkirchen. De manera similar, la conexión entre los incidentes de sabotaje en varios sitios militares alemanes la semana pasada y la alerta en Geilenkirchen sigue sin aclararse. Después de la investigación, se reanudaron las operaciones normales en estos sitios. La policía y la protección del estado llevaron a cabo una investigación en Colonia-Wahn después de que se sospechara de contaminación del agua en las instalaciones de agua de la base de la fuerza aérea. También se observaron actividades inusuales en Geilenkirchen, lo que llevó al Lea también: [Se constituye un nuevo grupo parlamentario de derechas en el Parlamento Europeo, sin la AfD](https://aussiedlerbote.de/es/se-constituye-un-nuevo-grupo-parlamentario-de-derechas-en-el-parlamento-europeo-sin-la-afd/) [Indignación por supuestos planes de asesinato contra el CEO de Rheinmetall](https://aussiedlerbote.de/es/indignacion-por-supuestos-planes-de-asesinato-contra-el-ceo-de-rheinmetall/) [La alianza de derechas de Orban en la UE, a punto de alcanzar la categoría de grupo parlamentario](https://aussiedlerbote.de/es/la-alianza-de-derechas-de-orban-en-la-ue-a-punto-de-alcanzar-la-categoria-de-grupo-parlamentario/) [USA pidiendo acuerdo de rehenes - advirtiendo palabras a Netanyahu](https://aussiedlerbote.de/es/usa-pidiendo-acuerdo-de-rehenes-advirtiendo-palabras-a-netanyahu/)

author: ahotsa
title: #16 El sacerdote Antonio Casado: "El obispo de Cádiz me obligó a donar fundaciones de caridad para controlar el dinero"
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
Desde los templarios, los Borgia, el banco Ambrosiano, etc., son tantos los casos que indican que su reino sí es de este mundo, que levanta el ánimo ver que todavía quedan personas dentro de esta institución que creen en algunos pilares éticos. Abogo por más información directa, concreta, constante, para que poco a poco los sinvergüenzas queden cada vez más arrinconados en una sociedad cada vez más autocrítica.
[#2](c2#c-2) Hasta que te informas y resulta que te obligan a hacer chorrocientos trámites y papeleos, además de visitas a parroquias buscando tu registro. Este coñazo echa a mucha gente para atrás.
Ya que en Hacienda se integran tan bien con la iglesia para la X del IRPF, a ver cuándo ponen otra casilla al lado de "QUIERO APOSTATAR".
[#4](c4#c-4) [#2](c2#c-2) https://www.google.com/amp/s/cadenaser.com/nacional/2023/04/06/apostatar-en-espana-sin-datos-oficiales-y-con-un-proceso-relativamente-sencillo-cadena-ser/%3foutputType=amp gracias a los 2, al menos me habéis hecho replantearme la necesidad de intentarlo.
[#2](c2#c-2) Me parece estupendo, pero no creo que tenga consecuencias reales.
Lo que hay que hacer es no darles ni un céntimo, ni a nivel particular, ni desde el gobierno, aunque esto es bastante difícil hoy por hoy.
Y hacer proselitismo del ateísmo como si fuera otra religión, que mucha gente simplemente pasa.
De toda maneras, tienen tal capital inmobiliario, que es imposible dejarles en la ruina. Como suelo decir, se van a convertir en una multinacional inmobiliaria.

author: Escrito por Meon
title: SJC: Instituto Alpha Lumen incentiva doações de IR para projetos sociais
text:
ontribuintes que desejam transformar parte do seu imposto em impacto social já podem realizar a doação de até 3% do IRPF devido para projetos sociais de São José dos Campos, sem pagar nada a mais por isso. A ação é promovida pelo Instituto Alpha Lumen, por meio do Fundo Municipal dos Direitos da Criança e do Adolescente (FUMDICAD-SJC).
A iniciativa permite que os recursos sejam aplicados em programas educacionais voltados a jovens da rede pública, especialmente os que vivem em situação de vulnerabilidade social. As atividades incluem robótica, astronomia, programação, design web, arte e outras áreas do universo STEAM (Ciência, Tecnologia, Engenharia, Artes e Matemática), preparando esses jovens para um futuro mais promissor.
Receba as notícias do dia - Clique AQUI para seguir o Canal do Meon no WhatsApp
As doações podem ser realizadas até o dia 30 de maio de 2025, por meio do site do Instituto Alpha Lumen. Para participar, o contribuinte precisa apenas calcular o valor permitido de destinação do IR e seguir o passo a passo para direcionar o recurso diretamente ao fundo municipal.
Receba mais notícias em nosso WhatsApp, entre no grupo!
Os comentários e avaliações são de responsabilidade exclusiva de seus autores e não representam a opinião do site.
